articles.description: IPO review: Kaynes Technology India, Global Health, Cyient DLM, Plaza Wires, and Senco Gold are among the top 10 mainboard IPOs since last Diwali. PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery, RBM Infracon and Bondada Engineering are among the top 10 SME IPOs.
